QueryDefinition.Query: SELECT DISTINCT A.PROVID AS PROVIDER_SOURCE_VALUE, A.STDPROV AS SPECIALTY_SOURCE_VALUE FROM {sc}.FACILITY_HEADER A WHERE A.PROVID IS NOT NULL UNION SELECT DISTINCT B.PROVID AS PROVIDER_SOURCE_VALUE, B.STDPROV AS SPECIALTY_SOURCE_VALUE FROM {sc}.OUTPATIENT_SERVICES B WHERE B.PROVID IS NOT NULL UNION SELECT DISTINCT C.PROVID AS PROVIDER_SOURCE_VALUE, C.STDPROV AS SPECIALTY_SOURCE_VALUE FROM {sc}.INPATIENT_SERVICES C WHERE C.PROVID IS NOT NULL UNION SELECT DISTINCT D.PROVID AS PROVIDER_SOURCE_VALUE, D.STDPROV AS SPECIALTY_SOURCE_VALUE FROM {sc}.LAB D WHERE D.PROVID IS NOT NULL
